alert.note: Alert for Hale; Hockley; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 1:44AM CDT until July 16 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Hale County in northwestern Texas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 143 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Shallowater, or 7 miles south of Abernathy, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Abernathy, Wolfforth, Shallowater, Idalou, Ransom Canyon, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Texas Tech University, Lubbock International Airport, Slide, Downtown Lubbock, Woodrow, Reese Center, New Deal, Buffalo Springs and Lubbock Science Spectrum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
